title: Administration of chapter
context: [ยง671-6] Administration of chapter. The director of commerce and consumer affairs shall be responsible for the implementation and administration of this chapter and shall adopt rules, in conformity with chapter 91, necessary for the purposes of this chapter. [L 1976, c 219, pt of ยง2; am L 1982, c 204, ยง8; am L 1983, c 124, ยง17]
